query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portfolio_esg_ratings (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolioId INT,
    portfolioName VARCHAR(255),
    calculationDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    portfolioScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    portfolioGrade VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    portfolioZone ENUM('excellent', 'good', 'fair', 'poor') NOT NULL,
    projectsRated INT NOT NULL,
    projectsTotal INT NOT NULL,
    greenZoneCount INT NOT NULL,
    needsAttentionCount INT NOT NULL,
    zoneDistribution TEXT NOT NULL,
    thresholdsVersionId INT,
    inputSnapshotId VARCHAR(64),
    calculatedBy INT,
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_portfolio_date (portfolioId, calculationDate),
    INDEX idx_calculation_date (calculationDate)
);

    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolioId INT,
    portfolioName VARCHAR(255),
    calculationDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    portfolioScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    portfolioGrade VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    portfolioZone ENUM('excellent', 'good', 'fair', 'poor') NOT NULL,
    projectsRated INT NOT NULL,
    projectsTotal INT NOT NULL,
    greenZoneCount INT NOT NULL,
    needsAttentionCount INT NOT NULL,
    zoneDistribution TEXT NOT NULL,
    thresholdsVersionId INT,
    inputSnapshotId VARCHAR(64),
    calculatedBy INT,
    createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    INDEX idx_portfolio_date (portfolioId, calculationDate),
    INDEX idx_calculation_date (calculationDate)
);
